values: A resourceful person is clever at using what resources they have.
Because he was very resourceful, he could make most of the things he needed rather than buying them.
adj. 资源丰富的；足智多谋的；机智的
adj.资源丰富的，富于机智的，有策略的,灵活多样，善于随机应变,诡计多端的，鬼点子很多的,有本领
